Initial request to the web-app which yields /.git directory
Uses wget or HTTrack to download the files and sub-directories from /.git
Checks the git log to review history of changes
Checks the change status using command `git status`
Runs command `git restore config.php` to access deleted file
Decrypts MD5 hash to gain relevant string
Uses automated tool `gittyleaks` to search for sensitive information in the .git directory
